duties_responsibilities.duty: Safely transport products and comply with all state and federal laws and regulations.
Provide exceptional customer service and maintain a safety-first mindset.
Drive 2019 or newer tractors and late model Great Dane refer trailers.
Complete thorough vehicle safety inspections and E-DVIR for mechanical conditions in need of repair.
Maintain pre-scheduled appointments, obtain necessary signatures on bills of lading, communicate any delays to dispatch, and provide basic math and map reading skills.

education_certification.credential: 100,000 miles driving experience or completion of a certified truck driving school
